titleStmt.title: A lamentable complaynte of Baptista Ma[n]tuanus, an Italysh poete wherin he famylyarly co[m]moneth wyth hys owne mynde, that deathe is not to be feared. Paraphrastically translated into oure vulgar Englishe tounge by Iohan Bale.
De morte contemnenda. English
titleStmt.author: Baptista, Mantuanus, 1448-1516.
Bale, John, 1495-1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [S. Mierdman? for] Ihon Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate beneth Sainte Martins,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De contemnenda morte.
Imprint from colophon; printer's name and publication date from STC.
Running title reads: Baptista Mantuanus de morte contemnenda.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
